1427890.name: Blaston
1427890.description:
Blaston is a fast-paced PvP VR shooter where your survival hinges on one simple rule: Never. Stay. Still.

Duel players in a slow-motion bullet-hell as you collect weapons, personalize your loadout, and move your whole body to dodge oncoming fire as you line up your next perfect shot. Customize your weapons with game-changing attachments, glow up your avatar and arsenal with new looks, and create player-hosted tournaments in the Ozo Lounge. Get ready to break a sweat!
